scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Christ, wearing a blue robe and a crown of thorns, carrying a large wooden cross. He is being assisted and tormented by several figures. To his left, a man in an orange tunic and blue hat pushes against the cross. To his right, two men, one in a pink tunic and yellow hat, and another in a blue tunic and hat, also interact with the cross and Christ. The man in the pink tunic appears to be pulling on a rope tied around Christ's waist, while the man in the blue tunic, holding a sword, seems to be urging him forward. The background is a rocky, uneven terrain with sparse green bushes, suggesting a path or hillside. The upper portion of the image features a decorative border with a geometric pattern of gold, blue, red, and green squares and diamonds.
